item.name: Authentication
item.description: User authentication and JWT token management endpoints

description.content: Register a new user account
Authenticate user with username/email and password, returns JWT token
Get information about the currently authenticated user
Generate new JWT token with extended expiration
Invalidate current JWT token and remove from database
Invalidate all JWT tokens for current user across all devices
Returns a status to verify the API is running
Returns database health status with connection statistics - requires authentication

Retrieve paginated transaction history with filtering capabilities for authenticated users

query.description: Filter by stock symbols (comma-separated for multiple values, 1-10 alphanumeric uppercase chars each)
Filter by trade type (comma-separated: Buy, Sell, Dividends)
Filter by exchange (comma-separated for multiple exchanges)
Filter by broker (comma-separated for multiple brokers)
Sort field (transaction_date, symbol, price, quantity, amount)

response.name: Success - Transaction History Retrieved
response.body:
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Transactions retrieved successfully",
  "data": {
    "transactions": [
      {
        "symbol": "AAPL",
        "type": "Buy",
        "quantity": 100,
        "price": 150.25,
        "amount": 15025.00,
        "currency": "USD",
        "exchange": "NASDAQ",
        "broker": "Firstrade",
        "account": "12345",
        "transaction_date": "2025-06-15",
        "user_notes": "Initial investment"
      },
      {
        "symbol": "GOOGL",
        "type": "Buy",
        "quantity": 10,
        "price": 2800.50,
        "amount": 28005.00,
        "currency": "USD",
        "exchange": "NASDAQ",
        "broker": "Firstrade",
        "account": "12345",
        "transaction_date": "2025-06-20",
        "user_notes": "Diversification purchase"
      }
    ],
    "pagination": {
      "page": 1,
      "page_size": 10,
      "total_records": 25,
      "total_pages": 3,
      "has_next": true,
      "has_previous": false
    },
    "filters_applied": {
      "symbols": ["AAPL", "GOOGL"],
      "timeframe": null,
      "type": null,
      "exchange": null,
      "broker": null,
      "currency": null
    }
  }
}
